mapper.select:
select
distinct
,(SELECT NAME FROM SYS_CODE WHERE TYPE = 'depositagr_status' AND CODE = STATUS) depositStatusName ,(SELECT NAME FROM SYS_CODE WHERE TYPE = 'deposit_gain_reason' AND CODE = CHARGE_REASON) depositTypeName from con_deposit_dist_log
order by ${orderByClause}
